00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdbool.h>
00029 #include <stdlib.h>
00030 #include <libusb.h>
00031 #include "freenect_internal.h"
00032 
00033 int fnusb_init(fnusb_ctx *ctx, freenect_usb_context *usb_ctx)
00034 {
00035         int res;
00036         if (!usb_ctx) {
00037                 res = libusb_init(&ctx->ctx);
00038                 if (res >= 0) {
00039                         ctx->should_free_ctx = 1;
00040                         return 0;
00041                 } else {
00042                         ctx->should_free_ctx = 0;
00043                         ctx->ctx = NULL;
00044                         return res;
00045                 }
00046         } else {
00047                 ctx->ctx = usb_ctx;
00048                 ctx->should_free_ctx = 0;
00049                 return 0;
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 int fnusb_shutdown(fnusb_ctx *ctx)
00054 {
00055         //int res;
00056         if (ctx->should_free_ctx) {
00057                 libusb_exit(ctx->ctx);
00058                 ctx->ctx = NULL;
00059         }
00060         return 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int fnusb_process_events(fnusb_ctx *ctx)
00064 {
00065         return libusb_handle_events(ctx->ctx);
00066 }
00067 
00068 int fnusb_open_subdevices(freenect_device *dev, int index)
00069 {
00070         dev->usb_cam.parent = dev;
00071 
00072         // Search for 0x45e (Microsoft Corp.) and 0x02ae
00073         //dev->usb_cam.dev = libusb_open_device_with_vid_pid(dev->parent->usb.ctx, 0x45e, 0x2ae);
00074 
00075         libusb_device **devs; //pointer to pointer of device, used to retrieve a list of devices
00076         ssize_t cnt = libusb_get_device_list (dev->parent->usb.ctx, &devs); //get the list of devices
00077         if (cnt < 0)
00078                 return (-1);
00079 
00080         bool start_cam = false, start_motor = false;
00081 
00082         int i = 0, nr_cam = 0, nr_mot = 0;
00083         struct libusb_device_descriptor desc;
00084         for (i = 0; i < cnt; ++i)
00085         {
00086                 int r = libusb_get_device_descriptor (devs[i], &desc);
00087                 if (r < 0)
00088                         continue;
00089 
00090                 // Search for the camera
00091                 if (desc.idVendor == MS_MAGIC_VENDOR && desc.idProduct == MS_MAGIC_CAMERA_PRODUCT && !start_cam)
00092                 {
00093                         // If the index given by the user matches our camera index
00094                         if (nr_cam == index)
00095                         {
00096                                 if (libusb_open (devs[i], &dev->usb_cam.dev) != 0)
00097                                         return (-1);
00098                                 // Claim the camera
00099                                 if (!dev->usb_cam.dev) 
00100                                         return (-1);
00101                                 int err = libusb_claim_interface (dev->usb_cam.dev, 0);
00102         if(err!=0){
00103           printf("Error claiming camera device: ");
00104           if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND){
00105             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND\n");
00106           }else if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY){
00107             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY\n");
00108           }else if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE){
00109             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE\n");
00110           }else{
00111             printf("Unknown error\n");
00112           }
00113           exit(1);
00114         }
00115         
00116                                 start_cam = true;
00117                         }
00118                         else
00119                                 nr_cam++;
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 // Search for the motor
00123                 if (desc.idVendor == MS_MAGIC_VENDOR && desc.idProduct == MS_MAGIC_MOTOR_PRODUCT && !start_motor)
00124                 {
00125                         // If the index given by the user matches our camera index
00126                         if (nr_mot == index)
00127                         {
00128                                 //libusb_open_device_with_vid_pid (dev->parent->usb.ctx, MS_MAGIC_VENDOR, MS_MAGIC_MOTOR_PRODUCT);
00129                                 if (libusb_open (devs[i], &dev->usb_motor.dev) != 0)
00130                                         return (-1);
00131                                 // Claim the motor
00132                                 if (!dev->usb_motor.dev)
00133                                         return (-1);
00134                                 int err = libusb_claim_interface (dev->usb_motor.dev, 0);
00135         if(err!=0){
00136           printf("Error claiming motor device: ");
00137           if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND){
00138             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND\n");
00139           }else if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY){
00140             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY\n");
00141           }else if(err==LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE){
00142             printf("LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE\n");
00143           }else{
00144             printf("Unknown error\n");
00145           }
00146           exit(1);
00147         }
00148                                 start_motor = true;
00149                         }
00150                         else
00151                                 nr_mot++;
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 
00155         libusb_free_device_list (devs, 1);  // free the list, unref the devices in it
00156 
00157         if (start_cam && start_motor)
00158                 return (0);
00159         else
00160                 return (-1);
00161 }
00162 
00163 static void iso_callback(struct libusb_transfer *xfer)
00164 {
00165         int i;
00166         fnusb_isoc_stream *strm = xfer->user_data;
00167 
00168         if(xfer->status == LIBUSB_TRANSFER_COMPLETED) {
00169                 uint8_t *buf = (void*)xfer->buffer;
00170                 for (i=0; i<strm->pkts; i++) {
00171                         strm->cb(strm->parent->parent, buf, xfer->iso_packet_desc[i].actual_length);
00172                         buf += strm->len;
00173                 }
00174                 libusb_submit_transfer(xfer);
00175         } else {
00176                 printf("Xfer error: %d\n", xfer->status);
00177         }
00178 }
00179 
00180 int fnusb_start_iso(fnusb_dev *dev, fnusb_isoc_stream *strm, fnusb_iso_cb cb, int ep, int xfers, int pkts, int len)
00181 {
00182         int ret, i;
00183 
00184         strm->parent = dev;
00185         strm->cb = cb;
00186         strm->num_xfers = xfers;
00187         strm->pkts = pkts;
00188         strm->len = len;
00189         strm->buffer = malloc(xfers * pkts * len);
00190         strm->xfers = malloc(sizeof(struct libusb_transfer*) * xfers);
00191 
00192         uint8_t *bufp = strm->buffer;
00193 
00194         for (i=0; i<xfers; i++) {
00195                 //printf("Creating EP %02x transfer #%d\n", ep, i);
00196                 strm->xfers[i] = libusb_alloc_transfer(pkts);
00197 
00198                 libusb_fill_iso_transfer(strm->xfers[i], dev->dev, ep, bufp, pkts * len, pkts, iso_callback, strm, 0);
00199 
00200                 libusb_set_iso_packet_lengths(strm->xfers[i], len);
00201     
00202     ret = libusb_submit_transfer(strm->xfers[i]);
00203     if(ret==LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE)
00204       printf("Failed to submit xfer %d: LIBUSB_ERROR_NO_DEVICE\n",i);
00205     else if(ret==LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY)
00206       printf("Failed to submit xfer %d: LIBUSB_ERROR_BUSY\n",i);
00207     else if (ret < 0)
00208       printf("Failed to submit xfer %d: %d\n", i, ret);
00209 
00210                 bufp += pkts*len;
00211         }
00212 
00213         return 0;
00214 
00215 }
00216 
00217 int fnusb_control(fnusb_dev *dev, uint8_t bmRequestType, uint8_t bRequest, uint16_t wValue, uint16_t wIndex, uint8_t *data, uint16_t wLength)
00218 {
00219         return libusb_control_transfer(dev->dev, bmRequestType, bRequest, wValue, wIndex, data, wLength, 0);
00220 }
